General.Name: African Metals Corporation
General.Description: AFR NuVenture Resources Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in North America. The company intends to acquire 100% interest in the Edge Properties located in southwest New Brunswick; and 51% interest in the Silver Bell " St. Lawrence Gold project located in the Virginia City Mining District of Montana, the United States. The company was formerly known as African Metals Corporation and changed its name to AFR NuVenture Resources Inc. in November 2021. AFR NuVenture Resources Inc. was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 925 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3L2
